snippet.title: Bad News Baseball (Tecmo, 1990) - NES Gameplay
snippet.description:
Looking for a baseball game that will challenge your skills and tickle your funnybone? You've finally found it. Bad News Baseball is the new cartoon-style, outrageously funny baseball game only from Tecmo. It's fast-paced and jam-packed full of new animated cinema displays and exciting action. And now, Bad News Baseball has boys uand/u girls teams! Play against the computer, play with a buddy, or use the spectator mode, but you had better get ready to laugh. Featuring 12 boys teams and 12 girls teams, 11 different pitches and Tecmo's famous instant close-ups, all you need is a hotdog and you're ready to play!

Known on Famicom as: Gekitou!! Stadium


NESGUIDE ARCHIVE INFO

The original NES gameplay archive, est 2007 includes gameplay captures from all commercial releases from the US market with a few extras (like famicom releases) just for fun. As of Dec 2024, I've resumed efforts to update some of the older (some 360p) videos with higher-def captures. Text updates will be posted to BlueSky (which doesn't require an account to view). Please follow there (or just bookmark the url) if you're interested!

https://bsky.app/profile/nesguide.com
